title: Return to Edan
description: From the ashes of the War of the Way arises chaos, and a new menace swarms over the battle-ravaged kingdoms of Eormenlond while disease and violence claim thousands. But the greatest threat to Eormenlond is its savior. Stark choices confront Dayraven's friends as they race to salvage what they can of their world. Amidst the vast struggle for survival and meaning is Seren, a girl from Caergilion who may hold the key to unlocking the Prophetâ€™s mind. The convergence of plotlines sweeps the tale back to where it all began in Return to Edan , the monumental conclusion of The Edan Trilogy .
author: Philip   Chase
